name: aw hell nah a sheep nightmare
name_original: aw hell nah a sheep nightmare
description:
controls:

wasd - moving

space - jump

shift - dash in the direction you are facing

left click - shoot

right click - throw your gun, and also retrieving your gun after thrown

the little sheep do not stop spawning until you have defeated the big sheep
